title: Low priority Queue
body:
I am done with this low prioirty Q thing. I am done waitining 20 minutes for just one game.

Reason why I got low priority Q is because I've got 2 games black screen due to a problem with graphics card drivers.
I am asking any Riot employee to remove my low priority Queue immediately!

I've joined 2 games and my graphics card drivers were bugged so my screen was pitch black. The guys in the game made a remake and the game didn't count but I've got low priority Queue for 20 minutes.

Like Riot is so stupid with this and LoL have the worst punishment system I've seen in games.
You have bugsplat, black screen, connection at the moment, etc. so you must be punished for things you can't fix yourself.

Why people that doesn't even join must be punished. When I am looking for a game and someone doesn't even join, I am mad but it's ok, it happens in a while... but why does that person must be punished ?

"Oh you were BORN with 2 hands you must be punished and we must cut those arms off" ?

https://i.imgur.com/4vEzs0j.jpg

replies.body: We aren't able to remove this leaverbuster, I know it wasn't intentional but all leaves still causes other players a poor experience.  I would like to help with these issues, though!  Black screens can indicate a connection issue that can't reach the game server, so I recommend going over the #[connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to resolve this.  It might be a good idea to stick to custom games for now as you test, so you don't receive more lower priority queues!
